root.name: Blood 'n Guts
root.description: Overview Selectable fighters. Blood and Guts: Ancient Barbarian Games contains four selectable fighters: Knorr, Hawk, Nop and Dog but apart from slightly different appearance there are't any important differences between them in terms of gameplay. The game offers 2 gameplay modes - compete and practise. The game combines butality with humor which resembles Caveman Olympics. The fighters compete in 10 different sport disciplines: Sending a cat to the outer space.- Polefight - Cat Throwing - Mountain Walk - Axe Throwing - Arm Wreck - Tug of War - Tower Jump - Rockroller - Ale Drinkung - Human Hit Failing in a competition results either in players death or severe injury or a comical situation.
